vendor.name: Local Distributors
vendor.title: Sufficient Trust Credit Due to Our Success with Partners
vendor.desc: The trust of Kouider's customers and their exceptional experiences have driven us to meet the increasing market needs. As a result, we now have a dedicated section for supplying bulk orders to companies and reaching as many locations as possible. The company has sufficient trust credit due to its success with outstanding partners in the Egyptian market, including hotels, restaurants, cafes, and companies. Therefore, do not hesitate to contact the company. The company also has a specialized team in professional Business to Business dealings, committed to deadlines, maintaining product quality, packaging, and presentation methods.

about.name: About Us
about.title: About Us
about.hero_title: We are changing the concept of healthy food worldwide
about.hero_content: Kouider Company was founded in 2010 and has become one of the most well-known names in the markets for providing high-quality natural coffee products, nuts, nut butters, healthy foods, and dried fruits... and more. Each product has its own story. Due to our continuous attention to detail, every step in the Kouider production process is carefully managed to ensure the production of high-quality products that are delivered with love and filled with nourishing ingredients from Mother Nature. We prioritize product innovation and consider market trends, customer preferences, and changing tastes. We always encourage a healthy lifestyle because our goal is not only to nourish the body but also to nourish the mind and soul, through a variety of herbs and different organic products. We hope to tell the story of the change you can make in the world when you change your eating habits to healthy, enjoyable, and delicious ones.
about.mission_content: 'Kouider was founded with a vision to change the future of food. Who said healthy food can't be delicious?'
about.now_content: We now have more than 150 branches in Egypt and our products can be found in most major supermarkets like Carrefour, Metro, Awlad Ragab, Bimbo, Oscar, Saudi, Hyper One, and Spinneys. We also supply many of our products to a variety of high-end hotel chains such as St. Regis, Four Seasons, JW Marriott, Marriott, Le Meridien, Ritz Carlton, and Westin, as well as to the Duty-Free and EgyptAir for over 10 years. Lastly, because we want to make sure you're always awake and energized on the road, we offer Kouider's Turkish coffee at 55 fuel stations. You can also find flavored teas at 20 stations. We ensure to cater to every customer's taste and provide a variety of essential daily consumption products such as coffee, tea, honey, and more. 'Kouider' is the preferred brand in the healthy and delicious snack market, offering easy access to healthy food and encouraging a healthy lifestyle.
